Activity: Arrive at work. Check emails and browse interesting articles online.
Address any urgent user inquiries or follow-up questions received overnight. Ensure all outstanding issues are resolved promptly.

Finalize the communication plan for informing users about the new support channels and the online help desk portal. Obtain approval from @ITPM-1 before implementation. @ITPM-1 Communication Plan Approval
Send out the announcement email to all users, providing clear instructions on how to access the new support channels and the online help desk portal.
Monitor the ticketing system closely to ensure it is working as expected and that users are able to submit tickets successfully. Respond to any initial inquiries or issues.
Lunch Break. Go to the cafe.
Continue refining the training materials for users. Address any questions or concerns raised by users during the initial rollout.
Gather feedback from users on their experience with the new support channels and the online help desk portal. Use this feedback to make improvements and address any pain points.

Meet with @DA-1 and @DA-2 to discuss how data from the ticketing system can be used to identify trends in user inquiries and improve the overall support process. @DA-1, @DA-2 Ticketing System Data Analysis
Document all the steps taken during the implementation process, including configuration settings, user guides, and training materials. This documentation will be valuable for future reference.
Review the week's progress, identify any outstanding tasks, and plan for next week's activities. Make sure there is nothing left out.
